column16: ARK, DOI, Handle, PURL, URN, URL

column4: The full title of the research product and its abbreviations or aliases.
Brief text that describes the research product; its content and features.
The creator of the research product. It could be a single person; a group of people; an organization; etc.
Person or organization that has contributed to the realization of the research product.
The publisher of the research product; e.g. the University hosting the research product.
The language(s) used in/by the research product.
Research activities afforded by the research product.
The URL of the downloadable files; if available; or the URL of the download page.
The website where the research product is presented.
The research project the resarch product belongs to.
The date or year the research product was released.
column16: accepted, available, copyrighted, collected, created, issued, submitted, updated, valid

column4: How the resource can be accessed. If more access rights are in place; describe how the main resource should be accessed here; and use 'Has part' to describe a subset for which different rights apply.
The license under which the research product is available to the public.
